name: ANTONYM GAME
description:
you can press F to toggle fullscreen

use arrows to move and up arrow to jump

us space or tab to change you collor 

the concept is simple , you have to survive the enemies waves 

change your collor to the same color as an enemy , to kill it while jumping on it

otherwise , if an enemy of a different collor touches you , you'll lose the game

the source code and the assets are free to use and links will be provided soon

thx for playing, 

#antonym
